segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 55
2. Rājakārāmavagga
19. Dutiyadevacārikasutta
Sāvatthinidānaṃ.
Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—jetavane antarahito devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāturahosi.
segments.en: And then Venerable Mahāmoggallāna, as easily as a strong person would extend or contract their arm, vanished from Jeta’s Grove and reappeared among the gods of the Thirty-Three.

segments.pli: Atha kho sambahulā tāvatiṃsakāyikā devatāyo yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā devatāyo āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
segments.en: Then several deities of the company of the Thirty-Three went up to Venerable Mahāmoggallāna, bowed, and stood to one side. Moggallāna said to them:

segments.pli: “Sādhu kho, āvuso, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
segments.en: “Reverends, it’s good to have experiential confidence in the Buddha. …

segments.pli: itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, have been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Sādhu kho, āvuso, dhamme … pe …
segments.en: It’s good to have experiential confidence in the teaching. …

segments.pli: saṅghe … pe …
ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
segments.en: and to have the ethical conduct that’s loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.

segments.pli: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, have been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”

segments.pli: “Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
segments.en: “My good Moggallāna, it’s good to have experiential confidence in the Buddha …

segments.pli: itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa moggallāna, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, have been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhamme … pe …
segments.en: It’s good to have experiential confidence in the teaching. …

segments.pli: saṅghe … pe …
ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
segments.en: and to have the ethical conduct that’s loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.

segments.pli: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa moggallāna, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.
segments.en: It’s the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, have been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”

segments.pli: Navamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Moggallāna visits the gods of the Thirty-Three and encourages them in the four factors of stream-entry.
